Package fr.exia.showboard

Class BoardFrame

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
fr.exia.showboard.BoardFrame
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoard, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class BoardFrame
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements IBoard

The Class BoardFrame.

This class is just used to load the BoardPanel. It extends JPanel and implements IBoard.

As the BoardPanel is a private class, BoardPanel is a Facade.

Version:
3.0
Author:
Paul-Kamga && Joseph
See Also:
JFrame, BoardPanel, Dimension, Rectangle, IBoard, ISquare, IPawn, Serialized Form
